info.name: SDMB Old Smileys
info.description: Replace the "new" vB3 smileys with the "old" vB2 smileys on http://boards.straightdope.com. The style is completely self-contained, with all images included. I tried to make it as upgrade-proof as possible.
info.additionalInfo: This style might work on other vBulletin forums, but you'll have to manually change the "include" settings to include your forum URL. It should work on at least vBulletin 3.x, but no promises.
